title: Wow, shit hit the fan
body:
The new rune system is a clown fest and the BE system is negligent.

We don't need hard math to know that a change of this size with the introduction of emotes and etc is one of the red flags of a cash grab. Riot is a company, and if I know companies it's that they love profit, so I don't really care about the responses I'm getting from the devs or etc. I know that this new system is much worse and it is now harder to gain BE and to get champs.

This is gonna take us forever to get BE.
